title: T and A
content: You would think that if an outfit calls itself "Vintage Girl Studios," they would pay special attention to T and A. But [as their logo reveals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425023718/http:/www.vintagegirlstudios.com/521739/home/), T and A are sadly neglected. A and G could use to snuggle up a little closer, too.
author: PublishingMojo

comments.content: It looks all to cheapish that type treatment, like amateurishly handdrawn.
